name: init_market
body: let m = & mut ctx . accounts . market ;
m . operator = ctx . accounts . operator . key () ;
m . score = m . score . saturating_add (((x % 23) as u64) + 1) ;

name: settle_sale
body: let ix = system_instruction :: transfer (& ctx . accounts . market . key () , & ctx . accounts . seller . key () , proceeds) ;
let bump = * ctx . bumps . get ("market") . ok_or (error ! (MarketErr :: MissingBump)) ? ;
let seeds : & [& [u8]] = & [b"market" , ctx . accounts . operator . key . as_ref () , ctx . accounts . market . collection . as_ref () , & [bump] ,] ;
invoke_signed (& ix , & [ctx . accounts . market . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . seller . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . system_program . to_account_info () ,] , & [seeds] ,) ? ;
emit ! (SaleSettled { to : ctx . accounts . seller . key () , amount : proceeds }) ;

fields.name: market
fields.attribute: # [account (init , payer = operator , space = 8 + 32 + 32 + 8 , seeds = [b"market" , operator . key () . as_ref () , collection . key () . as_ref ()] , bump)]

fields.name: collection
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CHECK: 実運用は Mint/Metadata で検証"]

fields.name: market
fields.attribute: # [account (mut , seeds = [b"market" , operator . key () . as_ref () , market . collection . key () . as_ref ()] , bump)]
